text: The MSME Development Institute, Chennai, will organise a two-week entrepreneurship development programme (EDP) in Pudukkottai shortly. Sponsored by the Ministry of Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises, the programme will be held at the Skill Kraft – Skill Training Center,29, SIDCO Industrial Estate, Mathur near Tiruchi. Persons of 18 to 35 years of age with a minimum qualification of a pass in class 8 can undergo the training. The programme will cover various aspects of entrepreneurship including identification of feasible projects, project report preparation, marketing and raw material purchase, and State and Central government schemes available for financial support. The classes will be conducted by successful entrepreneurs, bank and government officials. Certificates will be issued by the MSME Development Institute. Participants will be extended hand holding service for starting their own enterprises. The EDP is likely to begin on January 19, according to an official release. Interested candidates register themselves by dialling 9789737886, 9345104264 or 8056964444.
title: Entrepreneurship training
